1.title: The Submission Process

episode of.title: Confessions of a Casting Director (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

1.plot: Check out the first in our new series "Confessions of a Casting Director" as Award Winning Casting Director Jen Rudin discusses her book and goes in depth about the submission process.

2.title: Part II - Resumes

episode of.title: Confessions of a Casting Director (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

2.plot: Check out episode 2 of "Confessions of a Casting Director" with Award Winning Casting Director Jen Rudin. Watch as Jen discusses the do's and don'ts of acting resumes and the differences between a theater, television, and film resume.

3.title: Part III - Social Media's Effect on Casting

episode of.title: Confessions of a Casting Director (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

3.plot: Ever wonder how Social Media plays into Casting? Check out Shandon's latest video as he talks with award winning casting director Jen Rudin about the Do's and Dont's of social media etiquette and how followers and even Facebook posts can affect who walks away with the big role. For more in-depth insights, check out Jen's book "Confessions of a Casting Director" which is available on JenRudin.com and Amazon.

4.title: Part IV - Headshots

episode of.title: Confessions of a Casting Director (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

4.plot: What does it me to have a good headshot? Check out Shandon's latest video as he talks with award winning casting director Jen Rudin about how to have a headshot that stands out. For more in-depth insights, check out Jen's book "Confessions of a Casting Director" which is available on JenRudin.com and Amazon.

5.title: Part V - TYPES OF CASTING

episode of.title: Confessions of a Casting Director (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

5.plot: Not every audition or casting is the same. Check out Shandon's latest video as he talks with award winning casting director Jen Rudin about the different types of castings for actors. For more in-depth insights, check out Jen's book "Confessions of a Casting Director" which is available on JenRudin.com and Amazon.

6.title: Part VI - What To Look For

episode of.title: Confessions of a Casting Director (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

6.plot: What do casting directors look for in an audition? Check out Shandon's latest video as he talks with award winning casting director Jen Rudin about what casting directors look for during auditions. For more in-depth insights, check out Jen's book "Confessions of a Casting Director" which is available on JenRudin.com and Amazon.

7.title: Part VII - THE AUDITION ROOM

episode of.title: Confessions of a Casting Director (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

7.plot: What do casting directors look for in the audition room? Check out the last video in the series as Shandon talks with award winning casting director Jen Rudin about what casting directors look for in the audition room. For more in-depth insights, check out Jen's book "Confessions of a Casting Director" which is available on JenRudin.com and Amazon.
